plot: A scouting unit spies on enemy camps and reports back to their base on the enemy's strength. Following one such mission, they find a baby abandoned in some ruins. They take her with them and take turns caring for her.
title: Susaekdae
plot_es: A scouting unit spies on enemy camps and reports back to their base on the enemy's strength. Following one such mission, they find a baby abandoned in some ruins. They take her with them and take turns caring for her.
